global.description: Configure determine whether to enable DNS.

timeout.description: Configure specifies the amount of time to wait for a response to a DNS query. If the ip domain timeout command is not configured, system will wait 3 seconds for a response to a DNS query.

interval-time.description: The amount of time to wait for a response to a DNS query (s).

try-number.description: Configure specifies the number of times to retry sending DNS queries. If the ip domain retry command is not configured, system will retry DNS queries twice.

probe-count.description: Specifies the number of times to retry sending DNS queries.

rr-a.description: Count of received 'A' resource record types.

rr-aaaa.description: Count of received 'AAAA' resource record types.

rr-ptr.description: Count of received 'PTR' resource record types.

rr-cname.description: Count of received 'CNAME' resource record types.

rr-unknown.description: Count of received unknown resource record types.

standard.description: Count of sent standard query packets.

rcv-tcp-total.description: Total count of received TCP packets.

rcv-udp-total.description: Total count of received UDP packets.

drop-tcp-total.description: Total count of discarded TCP packets.

drop-udp-total.description: Total count of discarded UDP packets.

drop-len.description: Count of discarded length error packets.

drop-id.description: Count of discarded ID error packets.

drop-server.description: Count of discarded server error packets.

drop-code.description: Count of discarded code error packets.

drop-tc.description: Count of discarded truncated error packets.

drop-query-cnt.description: Count of discarded query count error packets.

drop-answer-cnt.description: Count of discarded answer count error packets.

drop-expand-name.description: Count of discarded expand name error packets.

drop-class.description: Count of discarded class error packets.

drop-other.description: Count of discarded other error packets.

sent-udp-total.description: Total count of sent UDP packets.

sent-tcp-total.description: Total count of sent TCP packets.
